title.rendered: STEDI 2.0M WIRING EXTENSION CABLE DEUTSCH DTP CONNECTOR STEDI LIGHT HARNESS

content.rendered:
2.0m Extension Cable with Seal DT or DTP connector

DETAILS

Listing is for the larger DTP Plug 

2.0m Extension Cable compatible with all wiring kits fitted with the Deutsch sealed DT and DTP connectors.

Please be aware that we have two varieties of the Deutsch connector, to ensure you are buying the correct one please refer to the attached image.

We generally use the smaller Deutsch DT connector for all light bars up to and including 200w, and the larger DTP connector is used for light bars beyond.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 2.0m Cable
  • Waterproof  DTP Connectors
  • Cable placed inside conduit

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2.0m DTP  Wiring harness extension lead
